newsitem.title: UK: UK's DTI details merger clearances.
newsitem.headline: UK's DTI details merger clearances.

text.p: Britain's Department of Trade and Industry said on Tuesday it had cleared the following proposed mergers:
--the proposed acquisition by Dana Corporation of Ingersoll-Rand Co's Clark Hurth business.
--the proposed acquisition by Thermo Instrument Systems Inc. of Life Sciences International Plc.
--the proposed acquisition by NT on behalf of Ingersoll-Rand Co. of Newman Tonks Group Plc.
